name: Time Machine Ride
description: Travel through past and future in this VR rollercoaster.

name: Dragon's Flight
description: Suspended coaster soaring over imaginary castles.

name: Neon Loop
description: High‑speed light coaster with underground neon tunnels.

name: Haunted House
description: Dark ride through a haunted tower with special effects.

name: Jurassic Jungle Coaster
description: Dino-themed coaster through wild jungle terrain.

name: Cosmic Spin
description: Spinning ride with glowing effects under stars.

name: Monkey Maze
description: Walk-through haunted maze with fog and surprises.

name: Retro Arcade Dash
description: Race around an old-school arcade-themed track.

name: Steampunk Spinner
description: Gear-driven spinners with Victorian sci-fi flair.

name: Pirate Splash Battle
description: Water cannon battle aboard pirate-themed boats.

name: Viking Storm
description: Swinging boat ride through thunder and lightning effects.

name: Galactic Arena
description: Laser tag in a futuristic sci‑fi arena.

name: Pixel Drop Tower
description: Vertical drop ride with retro 8‑bit graphics theme.

name: Magic Fairy Hourses Garden
description: Gentle fantasy ride through colorful gardens.

name: Alien Abduction Spin
description: Spinning gravity ride inside a UFO‑themed pod.
